simulation

Class Sheep

  • java.lang.Object
    • simulation.Animal
      • simulation.Sheep
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Sheep
extends Animal
implements java.lang.Runnable

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Sheep(int xPos, int yPos, Race sheep)
      Constructor

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void eat()
      Looks for the need "Plant" at the current xPos and yPos, if any is found it's added to hunger and the thread is put to sleep for 2000ms.
      void flee()
      Makes the current sheep to run away from the predator.
      float getNeed(Needs need)
      Stops the current thread and returns 1.0f.
      float getSize()
      Returns the age if age is less or equal to 1.2, else it returns 1.2.
      void kill()
      Removes the current sheep from the world, and releases all locks.
      float peekNeed(Needs need)
      Returns what the current sheep have to offer as need.
      void run()
      Makes it available for the sheep to eat, drink, propagate, age, die, get pregnant, get hungry, get thirsty.

      • Methods inherited from class simulation.Animal

        calcRotation, calculatePositionValue, findReadyToBreedAnimal, getAge, getGender, getPregnant, getReadyToBreed, getRotation, getX, getY, lock, setHunger, setHunter, setPregnant, setReadyToBreed, setRotation, setThirst, setXandYPos, unlock

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
